cooking instructions.1: Mix all the curd with eggs, sugar and mix everything thoroughly.
cooking instructions.2: Pour the flour into the curd and mix thoroughly.
cooking instructions.3: Put the pan on medium heat and pour sunflower oil into it.
cooking instructions.4: Make a few small balls from the resulting curd mass and put them on a plate.
cooking instructions.5: Fry the cheesecakes for 1-2 minutes until golden brown. Then turn them over to the other side and also fry until golden brown.
cooking instructions.6: Repeat until the curd is finished.

name: Red bean salad with cottage cheese, red onion and seasonal salad

cooking instructions.1: Open two cans of red beans in their own juice, drain the juice and rinse the beans with cold water.
cooking instructions.2: Mix the finished beans with finely chopped red onion, herbs, crushed garlic, olive oil, lemon juice and cottage cheese.
cooking instructions.3: Add salt and pepper, let the products two minutes to rub off on each other well and serve to the table.

cooking instructions.1: Pour a liter of water into a small saucepan and pour the washed lentils. Put the pan on medium heat.
cooking instructions.2: Grate a small carrot on a large grater, finely chop the onion. As soon as the lentils begin to boil, turn down the heat, and then add another 200 ml of water or broth. Cook for another ten minutes.
cooking instructions.3: Preheat a wide flat frying pan, add sunflower oil and butter there. Fry the onion and carrot.
cooking instructions.4: Add the fried vegetables to the pan, pour in the cream. Whip the soup with a hand blender so that it turns into a thick puree. Soup can be served to the table.

cooking instructions.1: Cut the vegetables coarsely, tear the salad into pieces.
cooking instructions.2: Bring strongly salted water to a boil and add the shrimp. After boiling, cook for 5 minutes.
cooking instructions.3: Peel off the shell from the shrimp.
cooking instructions.5: Sprinkle with sesame seeds and season with mayonnaise.

cooking instructions.1: Mix curd, eggs, flour, sugar, baking soda and salt in a bowl until homogeneous consistency.
cooking instructions.2: Heat the olive oil well in a small saucepan.
cooking instructions.3: Roll the dough into balls a little smaller than a walnut each using teaspoon or with your hands.
cooking instructions.4: Throw the donuts into boiling oil and fry over low heat, constantly turning over with a slotted spoon.
cooking instructions.5: Put the cooked donuts on a paper towel and leave for one or two minutes - so that it absorbs excess oil. Serve hot donuts, put on a platter and sprinkle with sugar powder mixed with vanilla.
